  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2064</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2064</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Ho fem o ho hem de fer?</string>
            <string language="en">Shall we do it or must we do it?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sollen wir ihn tun, oder müssen wir ihn tun?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Devons-nous le faire ou devons-nous le faire ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Devemos nós fazê-lo ou devemos nós fazê-lo?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">farlo o dobbiamo farli?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θα το κάνουμε ή πρέπει να το κάνουμε;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre l'ús dels verbs fer i donar segons el sentit de la frase en què es troben. Conté una presentació informativa, una activitat de pràctica (amb àudio) i una activitat d'autoavaluació. Adreçada al cicle superior de primària.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the use of the Catalan verbs "fer" and "donar" according to the meaning of the sentence. The unit includes an introduction, a practice activity with soundtrack, and a self-assessment exercise. Aimed at 10- to 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escriptura</string>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
            <string language="es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
dem Gebrauch von den katalanischen Verben "fer" und "donar" 
entsprechend der Bedeutung des Programmsatzes. Die Maßeinheit 
schließt eine Einleitung, eine Praxisaktivität mit Ton und eine 
Selbstbewertung Übung ein. Angestrebte 10 zu 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
l'utilisation des verbes catalans "maintenance" et "donar" selon la 
signification de la phrase. L'unité inclut une introduction, 
une activité de pratique avec la bande sonore, et un exercice de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment. 10 visés à 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no uso dos verbos
catalan "fer" e "donar" de acordo com o meaning da sentença. A 
unidade inclui uma introdução, uma atividade da prática com 
soundtrack, e um exercício do self-assessment. 10- visados a 
12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sull'uso dei 
verbi catalan "fer" e "donar" secondo il significato della frase. 
L'unità include un'introduzione, un'attività di pratica con la
colonna sonora e un'esercitazione di valutazione di se stesso. 
10 puntati su a 12-year-olds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη χρήση 
των καταλανικών ρημάτων "fer" και "donar" σύμφωνα με την 
έννοια της πρότασης. Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει μια εισαγωγή, 
μια δραστηριότητα πρακτικής με την ηχητική λωρίδα, και μια άσκηση
αυτοαξιολόγησης. Στοχευμένος σε 10 στο 12-έτος.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
